short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows grepping header names and values of all requests

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Header Grep makes it easy to search and filter HTTP request and response headers directly from Chrome's Developer Tools.

Effortlessly filter header names and values on both requests and responses.

- Advanced search capabilities using regular expressions to match specific headers and values.
- Adds a dedicated tab to Chrome DevTools for quick and intuitive monitoring of headers, with powerful search features.
- Perfect for developers and testers who need to quickly analyze and debug HTTP headers with precision.
